fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of every day and every night, you will be given a new random role, copying all of its abilities and attributes.
- Whenever you copy another role, you'll lose the abilities and attributes of whichever role you previously copied.
- If you copy an evil role, you won't be allowed into the faction chat.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Complete the objective of whichever role you're currently copying. Although you will shift through many different goals, you only need to complete a single goal at the time that you have said goal, and you automatically win.
